about_the_game:
Unlock six of Atlas' most fearsome freelancers, then unleash true darkness with 8 sinister skins.

INCLUDES
  • Aurora + 2 Aurora Necrolancer Skins
  • Asana + 2 Asana Necrolancer Skins
  • Blackburn + Blackburn Necrolancer Skin
  • Meridian + Meridian Necrolancer Skin
  • Phaedra + Phaedra Necrolancer Skin
  • Su-Ren + Su-Ren Necrolancer Skin
detailed_description:
Unlock six of Atlas' most fearsome freelancers, then unleash true darkness with 8 sinister skins.

INCLUDES
  • Aurora + 2 Aurora Necrolancer Skins
  • Asana + 2 Asana Necrolancer Skins
  • Blackburn + Blackburn Necrolancer Skin
  • Meridian + Meridian Necrolancer Skin
  • Phaedra + Phaedra Necrolancer Skin
  • Su-Ren + Su-Ren Necrolancer Skin

name: Atlas Reactor – Necrolancer Freelancer Six Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista™ Enterprise (6.0, Build 6002) Service Pack 2 (6002.vistasp2_gdr.150312-1556) or later
  • Processor: Quad Core. Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2520M CPU ~2.5GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display Memory: 1696 MB - Min. Shader Level: 3.0 - Supports Render Textures
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account

short_description: Unlock six of Atlas' most fearsome freelancers, then unleash true darkness with 8 sinister skins.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
